title: Impeachment Talk Riles Trump & A Call for Democrats to Be as Ruthless as the GOP | Christian Siriano
itunes:title: Impeachment Talk Riles Trump & A Call for Democrats to Be as Ruthless as the GOP | Christian Siriano
description:
Top Democrats support impeachment for President Trump, Neal Brennan makes the case for a more relentless Democratic Party, and Christian Siriano chats about "Project Runway."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
